trans-unit.source: The backup file does not exist
trans-unit.target: The backup file does not exist

trans-unit.source: The "Backups" directory located in the admin directory must be writable (CHMOD 755 / 777).
trans-unit.target: The "Backups" directory located in the admin directory must be writable (CHMOD 755 / 777).

trans-unit.source: It appears the backup was successful, however you must download and carefully verify the backup file before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: It appears the backup was successful, however you must download and carefully verify the backup file before proceeding.

trans-unit.source: Unable to open your backup directory
trans-unit.target: Unable to open your backup directory

trans-unit.source: The limit chosen is larger than the server's maximum upload limit. Please increase the limits of your server.
trans-unit.target: The limit chosen is larger than the server's maximum upload limit. Please increase the limits of your server.
